EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-17 Customer Invite to 5/23 Webinar.ES-05-17-18 Customer Invite to May
EmailTemplate.subject: Would you like to take a closer look at Turbonomic 6.1?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Given your role in the Turbonomic community, we want to make sure you had a chance to take a closer look Turbonomic's latest features. Please join us for our next webinar on May 23rd at 1pm EST!
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>
We're going to explore how Turbonomic’s AI-powered decision engine continuously optimizes RI recommendations in concert with resizing automation – to drive the elasticity AND cost savings you want and expect from the cloud.
We hope you can join us <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>! Regards, Team Turbonomic
PS - If you can't join the live webinar but would like to learn more, please feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterward.
